message: I'll take the lion's share this time, Bob. But don't worry, we can always work something out later.
Alice, that's a tough start. I'm proposing a more even split this time. Let's not drag this out and lose money to inflation.
Let's be reasonable, Bob.  I'm willing to give you a larger share this time, but I still need to get a decent return. This is our last chance to avoid further inflation.
